author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Hindu Young World, in association with Thyrocare, will conduct a painting competition in 21 centres across the country.

Students from Class IV onwards are eligible to participate.

Registration

For registration and other details, students have to log on to:www.thehindu.com/ywpaintingwhere they can get their unique ID.

Students should get their paintings certified by their principal or art teacher that it was the original work of the participant.

Students should write their unique ID on the top of drawing and send it to any of the 21 centres where they would like to attend the final competition, if their entry is selected. The last date for entries is February 27.

The selected students will be intimated through email and they have to come to the venue (with the intimation letter) at their own cost on the specified date to participate in the finals.

Finals

Topics for the finals will be given at the venue. All finalists will be given certificates.

The finals will be held on March 13 and 14, according to a release.
title: The Hindu Young World painting competition
